resources.string:
An Instant Messaging app to communicate over short distance using Wi-Fi Direct.
 
The app lets the users communicate over a short distance using Wi-Fi Direct.
 
Users are able to
 (a) create profile,
 (b) update profile,
 (c) send messages,
 (d) receive messages,
 (e) delete stored messages.
 
All data are stored in the smartphone using SQLite database.

This project was done by team 'Premium Techs' as part of the Mobile Application course.
 
The team consisted of five students of PGDIT 20th batch, Institute of Inormation Technology, University of Dhaka.
 2005: Mimma Akter
 2008: Md. Nazmus Sakib
 2027: Kazi Naima Sultana
 2039: Ahmed Ullah
 2003: Md. Ashraful Haq Rahat
\nSource code of this project is available at: \nhttps://github.com/Premium-Techs/Chirkut/
